remarks: Define base set of Hilbert space, for use if we want to develop Hilbert space independently from the axioms (see comments in ~ ax-hilex ).  Note that ` ~H ` is considered a primitive in the Hilbert space axioms below, and we don't use this definition outside of this section.  This definition can be proved independently from those axioms as theorem ~ hhba . (Contributed by NM, 31-May-2008.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
